docs.snippet: Though the veteran activist Nelson Peltz is joining the Madison Square Garden Company’s board, the company’s choice of new board members came about after the hedge fund JAT Capital Management disclosed in August that it had purchased a stake....

headline.main: Shareholder Pressure Helped Lead to New MSG Board Members

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

docs.abstract: Though the veteran activist Nelson Peltz is joining the Madison Square Garden Company’s board, the company’s choice of new board members came about after the hedge fund JAT Capital Management disclosed in August that it had purchased a stake.

docs.snippet: A U.N. human rights investigator said Tuesday that he was surprised and gratified that North Korean officials raised the possibility of allowing him to visit their country, but the prospect of such a trip remains deeply uncertain because of demand...

headline.main: UN Investigator Cautious on North Korea Engagement
headline.print_headline: UN Investigator Cautious on North Korea Engagement

docs.lead_paragraph: A U.N. human rights investigator said Tuesday that he was surprised and gratified that North Korean officials raised the possibility of allowing him to visit their country, but the prospect of such a trip remains deeply uncertain because of demands the North Koreans made in exchange.

docs.snippet: The head of the nation's biggest car dealership chain says it won't sell used cars being recalled for exploding air bags due to conflicting advice from automakers and lack of direction from the government....

headline.main: AutoNation Halts Sales of Cars in Air Bag Recalls
headline.print_headline: AutoNation Halts Sales of Cars in Air Bag Recalls

docs.snippet: The Marvel cinematic universe is expanding with new characters Doctor Strange, Black Panther and Captain Marvel, who will be the first female superhero to anchor her own Marvel film, the Walt Disney Co-owned studio said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Marvel Expands With Dr. Strange, Female Captain Marvel Films
